name: BeBop 'n Drop
overview: BeBop 'n Drop is a real-time puzzle game and an enhanced commercial release of the shareware game Obsess-O-Matic. The object is to fit the falling playing cards together to form complete horizontal rows, which will then disappear off the bottom of the board. The game was republished in early 1993, including further enhancements, notably a built-in editor allowing players to create their own piece sets, change sound sets, design their own playing boards or alter the levels provided.
